description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国回族政治人物，中国共产党党员。曾任宁夏回族自治区人大常委会副主任、党组成员。
description.en: A Chinese politician of Hui ethnicity and a member of the Communist Party of China. He served as the Vice Chairman and a member of the Party Leadership Group of the Standing Committee of the People's Congress of the Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region.

nodes.id: 宁夏回族自治区人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 宁夏回族自治区人民代表大会常务委员会
宁夏回族自治区人大常委会
en: Standing Committee of the People's Congress of Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region

description.zh-cn: 宁夏回族自治区人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the People's Congress of the Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宁夏回族自治区的首府，刘兴中的出生地。
description.en: The capital of the Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region in the People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Liu Xingzhong.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家，是刘兴中进行政治活动的地点。
description.en: A country in East Asia, where Liu Xingzhong conducted his political activities.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 宁夏回族自治区人民代表大会常务委员会

position.en: Vice Chairman, Member of the Party Leadership Group

description.zh-cn: 刘兴中曾担任宁夏回族自治区人大常委会副主任、党组成员。
description.en: Liu Xingzhong served as the Vice Chairman and a member of the Party Leadership Group of the Standing Committee of the People's Congress of the Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类，刘兴中是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to Wikipedia categories, Liu Xingzhong is a member of the Communist Party of China.
Liu Xingzhong is from Yinchuan, Ningxia.
